mapper.insert: insert into systemlog (opuser_id, optime, opip, function, params) values (#{opuser.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{optime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{opip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{function,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, opuser_id, optime, opip, function, params from systemlog
